attributes.action: build a railway line to service Leeds Bradford Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Leeds-Harrogate railway line runs about half a mile from the end of the runway at Leeds Bradford Airport. Please consider building a branch line and station at the airport, so that trains from Leeds, Harrogate and York can service the airport, and take traffic off the congested single-carriageway roads around Yeadon, Rawdon and Horsforth (A65/A658/A660).
